content.description: Sit starting just left of the arete using two edges. Bump you left up edges and use the arete for the right.  It is a hard sit start.
content.location: This is on the Thud Boulders which is wedged between the Crazy Boulder and the Rum Boulder.  Look for two boulders leaning against each other.  The problem is on the back side (away from the road)

content.description: Start low in small scoop on crimps. Move up and right to gain a crimp rail. Build feet and go up to more crimps to an easy finish. Big flake to the right is off.
content.location: On the southeast end of the boulder 10 feet behind Bacardi Silver. Just to the looker's right of a steep warmup boulder with 4 juggy problems. To the left of a big flake.

content.description: Start on a hueco under cling and make a big move out left to the base of the arete. Move up to the left side of the arete. Work up using thin holds and shallow left facing dihedrals.  This is a very cool problem and easily missed. Not in Black Bible.
content.protection: Not the best landing if you blow the top out, but you probably won't. The business can be protected with 2-3 pads.
content.location: Southwest corner of the large boulder located 10 feet to the west of the Rum boulder. Start down in a hole.

content.description: start on a right facing rail in the cave and go up. packs a lot of punch into 2-3 moves. if you swing into the boulder behind you "thud" might be the sound you hear in your head.
content.protection: pad. need a spotter behind you in case you land on the boulder behind the problem
content.location: Immediately to the west of bacardi silver there is a boulder. On the north side of that boulder is a small cave created with another boulder. the problem is on that second boulder. starts on the east side in the cave.
